text: Dave Fortman (born July 11, 1967) is an American music producer and musician. He used to play rhythm guitar in the California-based rock band Ugly Kid Joe through the 1990s. He also co-owns a recording studio called Balance Productions which is in Louisiana. He recently worked with Slipknot on their fourth studio album called All Hope Is Gone. ==Other websites== * Official Ugly Kid Joe MySpace page * Balance Productions * Ugly Kid Joe Fan Site Category:American rock guitarists Category:Living people Category:1967 births
title: Dave Fortman
